titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide that future increases in the monthly amount paid by the State of New York to blind disabled veterans should be excluded from the determination of annual income for purposes of payment of pension by the Secretary of Veterans' Affairs.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S4634-4635)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans.

bill.summary: 4/19/1993--Introduced. Excludes from the determination of income, for purposes of the payment of pension by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs, any future increases made by the State of New York in the monthly amount paid to blind and totally disabled veterans.
